example: It's such a lovely day today. I feel like going to the park to play with my dog.
When I was a child I used to like riding bicycles outside. I want to start doing that again..
I have an exam tomorrow. I should really study this material otherwise I will fail.
When I was at school, I really liked reading books in the library. Reading made me understand the anatomy of my dog.
Umsebenzi wami ngiyawuthanda. Ngiyakuthanda ukwakha izinto ezisiza abantu empilweni zabo.
Ngivuka ekuseni kwelanga nsuku zonke ngilubhekise edolobheni. Kulapho engiyiphanda khona imali.
